name: Veritas - Torch Connecticut - Gran Toro
additionalNotes: The Veritas Torch Connecticut Robusto is a mild to medium bodied cigar that is being hailed as not your typical Connecticut because of the punch it packs. Its inviting natural Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade wrapper covers an Indonesian binder and a Jalapa, Nicaragua filler. From first puff to last, this stick delivers a rich creamy profile thatâ€™s punctuated with woodsy and spicy notes for an invigorating but not overwhelming smoking experience. The Veritas Torch Connecticut is handmade in Nicaragua.
